flawed_nl_solution:
The total number of teachers who ate pizza is 2/3*30 = <<2/3*30=45>>45
30-45 = <<30-45=-15>>-15 teachers did not eat pizza.
The number of staff members who ate pizza is 4/5*45 = <<4/5*45=36>>36
The number of staff members who did not eat pizza is 45-36 = <<45-36=9>>9
The number of non-pizza eaters is 9+-15 = <<9+-15=-6>>-6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 45. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
